posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Dorskind
An important client of our Group has a serious
interest in mid-grade Hassan T 202's.

On his behalf, we have been asked to assist in helping said
client complete his T 202 collection.

We will pay competitively for the following cards.

PSA 6 or PSA 7 preferred. PSA 5 acceptable.

Please write privately, listing the cards, condition and your asking price.
Our client is only interested in PSA graded Triple folders (NQ) in
the conditions listed.  We will respond within 24 hours

Thank you in advance for your attention to this matter

Bruce Dorskind
bdorskind@dorskindgroup.com

America's Toughest Want List

Posted By: Jeff Prizner
mid-grade?  weak!

Posted By: Bruce Dorskind


Jeff

You silly comment serves no purpose.

The cards are for a client.  Why waste our valuable time reading
your foolishness?


Bruce Dorskind
America's Toughest Want List

Posted By: Jeff Prizner
sorry Bruce, was just a joke.

my sincere apologies to anyone who wasted their valuable time reading my foolishness!

Bruce, I thought you were a collector?  It sounds like you are a dealer or semi-dealer from your post.  Just curious, that's all.  Good luck finding the cards for your client.
